articles.title: Flight delays and cancellations: Sen. Maria Cantwell questions airline CEOs - The Washington Post
articles.description: The chairwoman of the Senate committee that oversees the aviation industry sent letters to chief executives at Allegiant, American, Delta, JetBlue, Southwest and Republic, questioning their management of schedules and workers.

articles.title: Cash-flush Americans lift U.S. retail sales; shortages depress auto purchases - Reuters
articles.description: U.S. retail sales unexpectedly increased in June as demand for goods remained strong even as spending is shifting back to services, supporting expectations that economic growth accelerated in the second quarter.

articles.title: COVID breakthrough infections strike summer tourists visiting Provincetown - Bay Area Reporter, America's highest circulation LGBT newspaper
articles.description: Dozens of summer tourists who were among those visiting the gay resort town of Provincetown, Massachusetts over the weekend came back with more than beach memories and a tan: They tested positive for COVID-19 — even though they were fully vaccinated.
